verses.name: Job 38:8
verses.text: Or who shut up the sea with doors, when it brake forth, as if it had issued out of the womb?

verses.name: Job 38:9
verses.text: When I made the cloud the garment thereof, and thick darkness a swaddlingband for it,

verses.name: Job 38:10
verses.text: And brake up for it my decreed place, and set bars and doors,

verses.name: Job 38:11
verses.text: And said, Hitherto shalt thou come, but no further: and here shall thy proud waves be stayed?

verses.name: Job 38:12
verses.text: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
